infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Sampatti Salahkar usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar uses your microphone while taking video of your property for uploading in listing information.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Sampatti Salahkar wants to track you to collect IDFA to deliver personalised ads.
